```typescript
export declare class DidKeyMethod implements DidMethod 
```

|  [createEncryptionMethod(options)](./dids.didkeymethod.createencryptionmethod.md) | <code>static</code> | Decoding a multibase-encoded multicodec value into a verification method that is suitable for verifying that encrypted information will be received by the intended recipient. |
|  [createSignatureMethod(options)](./dids.didkeymethod.createsignaturemethod.md) | <code>static</code> | Decodes a multibase-encoded multicodec value into a verification method that is suitable for verifying digital signatures. |
|  [deriveEncryptionKey(options)](./dids.didkeymethod.deriveencryptionkey.md) | <code>static</code> | Transform a multibase-encoded multicodec value to public encryption key components that are suitable for encrypting messages to a receiver. A mathematical proof elaborating on the safety of performing this operation is available in: [On using the same key pair for Ed25519 and an X25519 based KEM](https://eprint.iacr.org/2021/509.pdf) |
|  [generateKeySet(options)](./dids.didkeymethod.generatekeyset.md) | <code>static</code> |  |
